replies.body: I've removed the account name and password for security reasons.  Sorry to hear that this happened, and it's really important to keep your information only to yourself.  Reach out to us in an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we'll take a look individually at your case.  We'll also be able to help with updating account information, so hang tight!
